string.name: help_link
string.u: How to do ICD coding with the APN ICD-10 Simplified Version.

resources.string: How to do ICD coding with the APN ICD-10 Simplified Version.
1. Select the appropriate section (1 to 4) to work with.
2. Using the keyword to find the diagnosis term based on the patient detail.
3. Choose the ICD-10 code(s) from the selected line.
3. Choose the ICD-10 code(s) from the selected line.
1. Help for the APN ICD-10 Simplified coding
